card.name: Crystal Memory
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Ghost Touch
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Deadly Fighter Braid Claw
card.text: ■ This creature attacks each turn Attack if Able

card.name: Lost Soul
card.text: ■ Your opponent discards all cards from his hand.

card.name: Bolmeteus Steel Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Energy Stream
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Mystic Dreamscape
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Return up to 3 cards from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Mystic Treasure Chest
card.text: ■ Search your deck. You may take a non-nature card from your deck and put it into your mana zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Wily Carpenter
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards. Then discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: The Grave of Angels and Demons
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ If there are 2 or more creatures that have the same Card Name ■ Look at each player's mana zone. If there are 2 or more cards that have the same Card Name

card.name: Faerie Gift
card.text: ■ This turn, the next creature you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Noble Enforcer
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature can't be attacked or blocked by creatures that have power 2000 or less. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, creatures that have power 2000 or less can't attack or block.

card.name: Webius, the Patroller
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Gravity Zero ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Jenny, the Dismantling Puppet
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

card.name: Ochappi, Pure Hearted Faerie
card.text: ■ Strike Back ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Fuuma Balzoo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Aku, Ultimate God
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Gods in the battle zone would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead. ■ God Link (tooltip ■ Whenever this creature attacks while linked, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Zen, Transcendent God
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ God Link (tooltip ■ While this creature is linked, it has "quattro breaker" and untaps at the End Step

card.name: God Saga
card.text: ■ Put up to 2 Gods from your mana zone into the battle zone.

card.name: Earth Eternity Gate
card.text: ■ Put a God that costs 7 or less from your graveyard or mana zone into the battle zone.

card.name: Super Trash Train, Fuuma Devil
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Saga, God of Destruction
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may un-link one of your linked Gods in the battle zone that have the Card Name ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, if you have at least one God in the battle zone, this creature stays in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Streaming Tutor
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all fire and nature cards into your hand and put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Maxval, Electro-Fuuma
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Your darkness creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Babelginus, Demonic Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. You may destroy one of that player's creatures. If you do, choose a non-evolution creature except '''Babelginus, Demonic Dragon''' from that player's graveyard and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Varz Romanov, Dark Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Beginning Romanov, Lord of the Demonic Eye
card.text: ■ Graveyard Galaxy Vortex evolution—Choose 3 darkness creatures in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose any number of cards under this creature and put them into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, choose a card in your opponent's hand at random. Then your opponent reveals that card and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following. :► Search your deck. Choose a spell that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then cast that spell for no cost. :► Search your deck. Choose a cross gear that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then generate that cross gear for no cost.

card.name: Primal Scream
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tornado Shiva Double Cross, Blastdragon
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, search your deck. You may take a creature that has Double Cross in its name from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 2 creatures in the battle zone. Those creatures battle. ''(They don't tap to battle.)'' ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Balzark, Sword Flash Fortress
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ All your creatures in the battle zone break twice as many shields. ■ If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other castles, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return one of your other shields to your hand instead.

card.name: Cyber A Irons
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 5 cards. ■ Whenever you put other water creatures into the battle zone, this creature can't be blocked that turn. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Lord Reis, Wisdom Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever you put a creature that has "Blocker" into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Pipippi, Electro-Riser
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an evolution creature, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Zerokage, Lightfang Lord
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Ninja Strike ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Hayabusamaru, Lightfang Ninja
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature, one of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Riku, the Oracle
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, if you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Tensai Janit of the Hidden Blade
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Leaf Storm Trap
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Hustle Castle
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. ■ If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other castles, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return one of your other shields to your hand instead.

card.name: Master Weapon - All Yes
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets +4000 power and has "blocker". ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Project God
card.text: ■ Put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If there are Gods among these cards that are able to link with one of your Gods in the battle zone, you may put those Gods into the battle zone and link it with that God.

card.name: Murmur, Vizier of Formation
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have "blocker" gets +3000 power.

card.name: Hanzou, Menacing Phantom
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the End Step ■ When this creature would be destroyed and you have at least one darkness card in your mana zone, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard instead.

card.name: Silver Glory, Invincible Fortress
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ Your creatures Win All Battles ■ If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other castles, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return one of your other shields to your hand instead.

card.name: Baiken, Blue Dragon of the Hidden Blade
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it instead. If you do, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Whenever you use a "Ninja Strike" ability of your Shinobi, you may draw a card.

card.name: Orochi of the Hidden Blade
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose another creature in the battle zone and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck. That creature's owner reveals cards from the top of their deck until he reveals a non-evolution creature, puts that creature into the battle zone, and then puts the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

card.name: Dark Sanji, Darkfang Ninja
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Bega, Vizier of Shadow
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

card.name: Algo Bardiol, Devil Admiral
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Grand Devil and Deep Marine from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

card.name: Fuuma Mehlwasp
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Slayer ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Fuuma Gorgonshack
card.text: ■ All spells cost 2 more to cast.

card.name: Fortune Slot
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put a creature, a spell, cross gear, and castle into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Blazing Tiger, Crimson Lord
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less.

card.name: Faerie Miracle
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Eco Aini
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If that card is a Dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Max, Crimson Blade Lord
card.text: ■ Mana Evolution ■ Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Scramble Typhoon
card.text: ■ Draw 5 cards, then discard 3 cards from your hand.

card.name: Super Explosive Duel Fire
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy all creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Kodamanma, Gil Gil Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Counterattacking Silent Spark
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. :► Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Child Festival of Faerie Fire
card.text: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone tapped, and the other on the bottom of your deck. If you put a fire card into your mana zone in this way, return this spell to your hand after casting it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Ogre Kaiser "Destruction"
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's psychic creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Perfect Madonna, Channeler of Suns
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, if this creature has more than 0 power, it stays in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Hirameki Program
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your non-psychic creatures. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature that costs 1 more than the destroyed creature. You may put that creature into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Aqua Librarian
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each creature in your mana zone. However, it can't cost less than 1. ■ This creature can't be blocked.

card.name: Codename Build Leone
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Mendelssohn
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Necrodragon Odol Needle
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Your opponent's attacking creatures attack this creature if able. ■ When this creature battles, destroy this creature and your opponent's creature after the battle.

card.name: Chopin, Dragon King
card.text: ■ While you have a Dragon in the battle zone, this creature gets "Shield trigger". ■ Guardman ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and battle it with this creature.

card.name: Prelude of Horror
card.text: ■ This turn, the next colorless creature you summon may cost up to 5 less.

card.name: Niyare
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of colorless cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Faerie Crystal
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a colorless card, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Truename Shuramaru
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution colorless creature, you may put it into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: 5000GT, Riot
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each creature in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Speed Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all psychic creatures. Then destroy all creatures that have power 5000 or less. ■ Players can't summon creatures that have power 5000 or less or put psychic creatures into the battle zone.

card.name: Rasha, Satori's Wanderer
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all non-colorless creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Carol, Gokigen Shout
card.text: ■ When this creature would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have a water card and a fire card in your mana zone, return this creature to your hand instead.
